mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (user_id, user_name, user_password, user_phone, email_id, email_domain, user_type) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{userPhone}, #{emailId}, #{emailDomain}, #{userType})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_name, user_phone, email_id, email_domain, join_date, user_type FROM members WHERE user_id LIKE CONCAT("%", #{word}, "%") ORDER BY join_date DESC
